column1: Regular traffic reports will resume Thursday February 27 at 4:00 p.m.

column3: Traffic Alert for Old Frankfort Pike:
column4: Roadway shutdown between the roundabout (Alexandria Dr) and Miles Point Way in both directions until further notice due to a ruptured gas line.

column3: Traffic Alert for Old Frankfort Pike:
column4: Update 2:29 p.m.:  Old Frankfort Pike is now open.
